For document processing questions, contact office manager Aisamal Rakhimzhanova.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfapayrollkz@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Payroll KZ \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"— all questions concerning wages, including changes in wages, vacation pay, amounts to be paid, and others.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfaaccountingkz@epam.com.\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Accounting KZ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — questions related to accounting, other than those related to wages, such as, but not limited to, requests for power of attorney, payment orders, invoices, advance reports, travel and other matters, should be sent to the mailing address of the accounting Department, not personally.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions on this section, please address them to your Resource Manager or HR Support.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
